name: Smiling Girls
description:
Help the beautiful girls to immerse themselves in their memories and remember the wonderful moments of their lives. This game is a classic puzzle game with multiple difficulty levels and beautiful arts. All the characters appearing in this game are over 18 years old.

- A game of logic

- Works of art

- Pleasant music

- Steam Achievements

Keyboard H: Full level

Sometimes girls can see covered nudity, which is transmitted through their outfits. Sensitive persons are advised to play with care. However, it does not contain any explicit nudity
